## Pull Request Template

Please complete the following checklist before requesting a review.

- [ ] Linked TASK IDs: (e.g., TASK-001, TASK-016)
- [ ] Spec documents updated if required (feature-spec.md, implementation-plan.md, tasks.md, etc.)
- [ ] `make spec-index` executed and manifest updated (if docs changed)
- [ ] `make spec-validate` passes locally

### Summary
Describe the change and rationale:

### Testing Plan
How did you test this change?

### Impact
Any risks, migrations, or operational considerations?
